title: Humane nature, or, The fundamental elements of policy being a discovery of the faculties, acts, and passions of the soul of man from their original causes, according to such philosophical principles as are not commonly known or asserted / by Tho. Hobbs.
author: Hobbes, Thomas, 1588-1679.
publisher: Printed for Matthew Gilliflower, Henry Rogers, and Tho. Fox,
notes: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
